ratings.comment: I really enjoyed taking this class. Participation matters but the lectures are very interesting to attend. Created an environment that was very encouraging to students who were just being introduced to philosophy. Although if you are looking for an introductory class that teaches the basics of writing philosophy papers, this may not be the class.
Super cool, easygoing, british guy. It is hard not to love him. Easy class. Attendance is heavily mandatory and lectures were sometimes boring, but so hard to not get an A. Def take for credit.
He was a super kind guy and I found his lectures super interesting! I would 100% recommend him to anyone looking to take a philo class.
That is a really great professor with amazing lecture

Super nice guy with a good sense of humor. I strongly recommend this class to anyone who wants an enjoyable, manageable, and engaging class. The discussion sections are probably unnecessary and attendance is mandatory but outside of that, you have to be comatose to not get an A. Plus he's British so that's kinda fun.
